name: v3.0.0
body:
# Fast DDS v3.0.0

This release includes the following **API** breaks:

1. XTypes refactor (#4042, #3974, #4496, #4497, #4190, #4368, #4640, #4240, #4712, #4626, #4746, #4901, #4874, #4969, #4970, #4985, #5000, #4780, #4787, #5092, #4768, #5091)
    * Regenerated IDL files with types header-only fastddsgen version (#4042)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicType`` (#4190)
    * Implementation of ``TypeLookup`` listeners (#4240)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicTypeBuilderFactoryImpl::create_type_w_type_object`` (#4368)
    * Re-implementation of ``TypeObjectRegistry`` and ``TypeObjectUtils`` classes (#3974)
    * Partial implementation of X-Types1.3 (#4640)
    * Structure ``DynamicType`` inheritance from ``TypeObject`` (#4712)
    * Automatic ``TypeObject`` representation registration for ``DynamicTypes`` (#4746)
    * Refactor ``TypeObjectRegistry`` (#4874)
    * Fix proxy block in ``TypeLookup`` service (#4901)
    * Added Annotation dependencies (#4497)
    * Dynamic language binding tests (#4626)
    * Improve X-Types interoperability (#4985)
    * Only signed integers are allowed in Dynamic Language Binding enumerations (#4969)
    * Refactor XML Parser to return ``DynamicTypeBuilder`` instead of ``DynamicType`` (#4970)
    * Make more flexible ``EDP::valid_matching`` with ``TypeInformation`` (#5000)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicData`` to JSON serializer (#4780)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicType`` to IDL serializer (#4787)
    * Fixes for indirect hashes dependencies (#4496)
    * Add missing ``DynamicType`` includes (#5092)
    * Add new tests for testing new key hash calculation according to DDS-XTypes 1.3 (#5091)
    * Support ``Type-Lookup`` Service with new new GUID-less Discovery Server (#4768)
1. Migration from RTPS to DDS (#4288, #4270, #4269, #4518, #4872, #4898, #4962, #4930, #5065)
    * Migrate fastrtps namespace to fastdds (#4898)
    * Migrate classes from ``include/fastrtps`` to ``include/fastdds`` (#4518)
    * Remove ``include/fastrtps`` (#4930)
    * Migrate ``fixed_size_string`` file from fastrtps to fastcdr (#4269)
    * Migrate ``ResourceManagement`` to rtps attributes API (#4962)
    * Remove ``RTPSParticipant`` listener overloaded callbacks (#4872)
    * Move ``Time_t`` to dds namespace and some attributes to ``xmlparser`` (#5065)
    * Migrate communication tests (#4288)
    * Remove deprecated fastrtps tests (#4270)
1. Make private previously public API (#4318, #4545, #4671, #4546, #4727, #4657, #4674, #4705, #4792, #4701, #4869, #4923, #4953, #5052, #5078, #5085)
    * Make private the necessary headers from ``include/fastrtps`` (#4545)
    * Make XML Parser API private (#4318)
    * Remove all redundant headers from ``include/fastrtps`` (#4546)
    * Make RTPS messages headers private (#4657)
    * Make RTPS reader implementations private (#4674)
    * Make RTPS writer impl private (#4869)
    * Make security private (#4792)
    * Make ``NetworkConfiguration`` private (#4671)
    * Make ``ResourceEvent`` private (#4705)
    * Make ``TimedEvent`` private (#4727)
    * Remove ``WriterProxyData`` from public APIs (#5052)
    * Remove ``ReaderProxyData`` from public APIs (#5078)
    * Remove ``TopicAttributes`` from public APIs and make it private in ``xmlparser`` (#5085)
    * Remove unnecessary header and make private ``SecurityException`` and ``Exception`` (#4701)
    * Make ``ChangeForReader``, ``ReaderLocator``, and ``ReaderProxy`` private (#4923)
    * Make Blackbox tests not include any private API (#4953)
1. Fastrtps package name migration to fastdds (#4251, #4500, #4576, #4963)
    * Branch-out to v3.0.0 (#4251)
    * Migrate DLL API exporter and auto linkage to fastdds (#4500)
    * Change windows file names (#4576)
    * Migrate ``fastrtps.rc`` to ``fastdds.rc`` (#4963)
1. GUIDLess Discovery Server (#4716)
1. Gather-send implementation (#4537)
1. Refactor IPayloadPool (#4892)
1. Participant discovery structures refactor (#5042)
1. Make all public headers .hpp (#4958)
1. ``const`` qualify all data related inputs in DataWriter APIs (#4960)
1. Refactor RTPS reader APIs (#4875)
1. Refactor RTPS writer APIs (#5028)
1. Refactor RTPS ``WriterHistory`` (#4966)
1. Refactor ``TopicDataType`` (#5066)
1. Make ``StdoutErrConsumer`` default ``LogConsumer`` (#4873)
1. All ``DataWriter::write`` overloads return ``ReturnCode_t`` type (#5049)
1. Add XML configuration for ``FlowControllerDescriptor`` and remove ``ThroughputController`` (#4837)
1. Move ``DataReader::TypeConsistencyEnforcement`` and ``DataReader::DataRepresentation`` from ``TypeConsistency`` to ``DataReaderQos`` (#4823)
1. Migrate ``BuiltinEndpoints`` defines to variables (#4851)
1. Remove ``string_convert`` header and source (#4890)
1. Update Fast DDS docs QoS examples (#4842)
1. Link SHM locator kind with Fast DDS major version (#5116)
1. Discard local SHM locators that cannot be opened (#5118)
1. Examples refactor for a more clear, homogeneous, and didactic explanation of several features (#4547, #4570, #4921, #4889, #4924, #4859, #4959, #5010, #4913, #5001, #5006, #5014, #5047, #4999, #5084, #5033, #5086, #5142, #5173)
    * Examples refactor: Hello World (#4547)
    * X-Types examples (#4924)
    * Examples refactor: Configuration (#4570)
    * Example refactor: Content filter (#4859)
    * Example refactor: Custom payload pool (#4889)
    * Examples refactor: Delivery mechanisms (#4959)
    * Example refactor: Discovery Server (#4913)
    * Examples refactor: Flow Controller (#4999)
    * Example Refactor: Request-Reply (#5014)
    * Examples refactor: Static EDP discovery (#5047)
    * Example refactor: Security (#5006)
    * Examples refactor: Topic Instances (#5033)
    * Example refactor: RTPS (#5086)
    * Fix non-defined duration Qos in configuration example (#5001)
    * Fix flakiness on test with participants in the same container (#5010)
    * Split example tests in different CTest tests (#4921)
    * Fix lack of entity argument issue in configuration example (#5084)
    * Fix windows issue with flow controller example (#5142)
    * Remove unexisting links in example READMEs (#5173)

This release includes the following **features**:

1. Type propagation policy (#5081)
1. Create Participant with default profile (use environment XML configuration) (#4534)
1. Create ``DomainParticipantExtendedQos`` class (#4779)
1. Add product version on Participant Discovery information (#4964)
1. Automatically unmatch remote participants on participant deletion (#4817)
1. Refactor Statistics module IDL (#4638)
1. Change PDP discovery database backup restore order (#4740)
1. Create ``InitialConnection`` for TCP initial peers (#4946)
1. New ``max_message_size`` property to limit output datagrams size (#4777)
1. Use ``PID_DOMAIN_ID`` during PDP (#4888)
1. Ubuntu example testing automation infrastructure (#4466)
1. Update versions in fastdds.repos file (#4621)

This release includes the following **improvements**:

1. Make ``DataReader::return_loan`` return ``RETCODE_OK`` on loanable sequences without loans (#4503)
1. Use absolute paths when loading XML files (#4751)
1. Remove ``FASTCDR_VERSION_MAJOR == 1`` related code (#5073)
1. Setting ``vendor_id`` on received ``CacheChange_t`` (#4978)
1. Builtin data related improvements (#5117)
1. GitHub repository management (#4723, #4758, #4775, #4785, #4990, #5031, #5061, #5057, #5123, #5102, #5137)
    * Prepare 3.0.x development branch to become master (#4723)
    * Switch master to 3.0.x (#4758)
    * Update .repos to use master branches (#4785)
    * [Migration guide](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/blob/master/UPGRADING.md) (#5102)
    * Update fastcdr thirdparty (#5123)
    * Consider library behavior changes as ABI breaks in the PR template checklist (#4775)
    * Update release support table (#4990)
    * Update release support for v2.6.9 release (#5031)
    * Update roadmap, release support and platform support docs (#5137)
    * Set 2.13.x as EOL (#5061)
    * Update 2.14 latest release in RELEASE_SUPPORT.md (#5057)
1. GitHub CI improvements (#4294, #4322, #4323, #4358, #4450, #4791, #4776, #4815, #4816, #4771, #4853, #4931, #4860, #4971, #4979, #4986,#5009, #5023, #5036, #5038, #5035, #5051, #5074, #5083)
    * Include CI workflows for 3.0.x branch (#4294)
    * Fix 3.0.x workflows (#4322)
    * Fix 3.0.x rebase workflow (#4323)
    * GitHub CI for 3.0.x (#4358)
    * Update mirror job (#4791)
    * Remove ``head_ref`` branch for discovery server in Github action (#4450)
    * Add DNS entries to hosts files on GitHub CI workflows (#4776)
    * Set fallback branch for ``get_related_branch_from_repo`` correctly (#4816)
    * Refactor Fast DDS Ubuntu CI to include several tests (#4860)
    * Remove Windows v141 / VS 2017 build from master CI (#4853)
    * Use token for CCache action (#4931)
    * CI - Avoid CCache in workflows and nightly jobs (#4971)
    * Add Ubuntu weekly CI (#5038)
    * Migrate 2.6.x ci from nighty jobs to weekly jobs (#5023)
    * Fix weekly CI cron expression (#5036)
    * Remove Valgrind build dependency for profiling tests (#4986)
    * Fix sanitizers CI test summary report (#4815)
    * Fix build issues and update CI infrastructure to detect them (#5083)
    * Fix python version in sanitizers CI (#5074)
    * Fix flaky latency tests on MacOS (#5009)
    * Fix ``ShmTransport`` buffer recovery MacOS flaky test (#4771)
    * Mitigate buffer recover test flakiness on MacOS (#5035)
    * Mitigate ``LogTests.flush_n`` flakiness (#5051)
    * Update README.md with GitHub actions Ubuntu CI nightly (#4979)

This release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Handle errors when setting socket buffer sizes (#4760)
1. Do not require ``PYTHON_VERSION`` to be defined in .bat files (#4770)
1. Use ``%*`` instead of ``loop`` in .bat scripts (#4814)
1. Set DataSharing in ``WriterProxyData`` and ``ReaderProxyData`` (#4761)
1. Minor fix in ``DDSBlackboxTestsBasic.cpp`` (#4862)
1. Fix PDP and EDP unittest compilation (#4871)
1. Fix ``AllocTest`` compilation (#4843)
1. Correct liveliness state in a multiple reader and one writer scenario (#4822)
1. Only apply content filter to ALIVE changes (#4835)
1. Fix compilation when building static library (#4813)
1. Properly delete builtin statistics writers upon ``delete_contained_entities()`` (#4891)
1. Correctly initialize ``MatchingFailureMask`` constants to be used with the ``std::bitset`` API (#4922)
1. Change monitor service writer entity id (#5070)
1. Fix EDP build warning without security (#4932)
1. Fix compilation warning (#4945)
1. Fix discovery server not connecting due to ports logic (#4941)
1. Fix assertion in ``TopicPayloadPool::release_history`` (#5008)
1. Fix topic interference on ``liveliness_changed`` status (#4988)
1. Fix typo in CMakeLists.txt (#5039)
2. Solve SecurityManager memory issue (#5115)
3. Fix installation of some examples (#5108, #5111, #5113)
1. Address some warnings when generating windows installer for v3.0.0 (#5152)
2. Add unsigned specification to literals (#5162)
1. Fuzzer regressions (#4939, #4961, #5007, #5080, #5122, #5163)
    * Address ``XMLDynamicParser`` Fuzzer regressions (#4939)
    * Fix parse XML dynamic type fuzzer issue (#4961)
    * Fix parse XML member dynamic type fuzzer issue (#5007)
    * Handle ``nullptr`` in ``parseXMLStructDynamicType`` (#5080)
    * Fix oss-fuzz build (#5122)
    * Fix warning in oss fuzz build (#5163)
1. Address build issues for documentation and different platforms (#4700, #4896, #4987, #5011, #5040, #5041)
    * Changes in doxygen to fix warnings on documentation (#4700)
    * Fix Doxygen errors for Doxygen versions prior to 1.8.19 (#4896)
    * Remove Doxygen directive ``@group`` in enumerations and ``typedefs`` (#5011)
    * Fix compilation in Ubuntu 24.04 platforms (#4987)
    * Fix Doxygen on Ubuntu 24.04 (#5041)
    * Fix compilation on VS 2022 in Debug (#5040)

This release includes the following **documentation updates**:

1. release_support.md, platform_support.md and roadmap.md (#5137)

PRs in merged order:

#4042, #3974, #4288, #4294, #4322, #4323, #4358, #4251, #4450, #4270, #4269, #4466, #4318, #4496, #4500, #4576, #4497, #4518, #4190, #4621, #4545, #4534, #4368, #4638, #4640, #4240, #4503, #4712, #4723, #4700, #4758, #4626, #4775, #4785, #4791, #4760, #4770, #4761, #4671, #4777, #4776, #4746, #4546, #4547, #4814, #4751, #4727, #4815, #4657, #4816, #4823, #4674, #4817, #4771, #4705, #4853, #4792, #4862, #4570, #4701, #4871, #4869, #4822, #4835, #4843, #4837, #4872, #4851, #4813, #4873, #4896, #4890, #4891, #4921, #4901, #4922, #4923, #4875, #4931, #4932, #4892, #4888, #4939, #4740, #4889, #4537, #4874, #4945, #4924, #4941, #4859, #4860, #4898, #4962, #4930, #4963, #4961, #4842, #4971, #4979, #4969, #4960, #4779, #4986, #4987, #4953, #4990, #4946, #4958, #4959, #4966, #5010, #5008, #5007, #5009, #4716, #5023, #4970, #4913, #4978, #5031, #4988, #5011, #5036, #5001, #4985, #5040, #5041, #5000, #5039, #5028, #4780, #5049, #5038, #5035, #5057, #5051, #4787, #5006, #5061, #5014, #5074, #5052, #5080, #5047, #4999, #5066, #5078, #5070, #5084, #5092, #5033, #5083, #5065, #5086, #5042, #5073, #5081, #5108, #4768, #5106, #5111, #4964, #5113, #5085, #5102, #5116, #5115, #5117, #5122, #5123, #5091, #5118, #5137, #5124, #5152, #5163, #5162, #5173, #5141

name: v2.13.6
body:
# Fast DDS v2.13.6

This release includes the following **improvements**:

* Create InitialConnection for TCP initial peers (#4947)
* Only apply content filter to ALIVE changes (#4902)
* Update version support documentation (#4996)
* Add XML configuration for FlowControllerDescriptor (#4905)

* Github CI management:
  * Refactor Fast DDS Ubuntu CI to include several tests (#4955)
  * Use token for ccache action (#4935)
  * CI - Avoid CCache in workflows and nightlys (#4974)
  * Update README.md with GitHub actions Ubuntu CI nightly (#4981)
  * Build profiling tests as alternate build in Ubuntu CI  (#4993)

This release includes the following **fixes**:

* Fix DS servers not connecting due to ports logic (#4950)
* Correctly initialize ``MatchingFailureMask`` constants to be used with the ``std::bitset`` API (#4926)
* Fix topic interference on ``liveliness_changed`` status (#5044)
* Properly delete builtin statistics writers upon ``delete_contained_entities()``  (#4915)
* Fix Latency tests (#5020)
* Remove doxygen warnings (#5024)

PRs in merge order:

#4902, #4935, #4955, #4950, #4926, #4974, #4981, #4996, #4993, #4947, #5024, #5020, #5044, #4915, #4905, #5060

name: v2.6.9
body:
# Fast DDS v2.6.9

ðŸ“¢ IMPORTANT: According to our [release support guidelines](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/blob/master/RELEASE_SUPPORT.md#release-support) Fast DDS v2.6.9 will be the last patch version receiving backported features and bugfixes. From now on, the v2.6 minor will only receive patches for critical issues and security fixes.

This release includes the following **features** in an ABI compatible manner:
1. Add XML configuration for FlowControllerDescriptor to 2.x (#4907)
2. New `max_message_size` property to limit output datagrams size (#4899)

This release includes the following **improvements**:
1. Update Fast CDR thirdparty submodule (#4733)
2. Consider library behavior changes as ABI breaks in the PR template checklist (#4784)
3. Allow processing of AckNack submessages with count == 0 (#4774)
4. Use `%*` instead of loop in `.bat` scripts. (#4821)
5. Use absolute paths when loading XML files (#4831)
6. TCPSendResources cleanup (#4513)
   
Github CI management:
1. Fix Python Installation version in Github CI. Address failing system tests environment issues (#4766)
2. Set fallback branch for get_related_branch_from_repo correctly (#4847)
3. Fix sanitizers CI test summary report (#4841)
4. Protect asio exception hotfix (#4533)
5. Set Fallback branch to 2.6.x (#4870)
7. Run selected VS tool on Windows CI (#4868)
8. Add DNS entries to hosts files on github workflows (#4811)
9. Refactor Fast DDS Ubuntu CI to include several tests (#4957)
10. CI - Avoid CCache in workflows and nightlies (#4976)
11. Update README.md with GitHub actions Ubuntu CI nightly (#4983)
12. Label flaky tests with `xfail` (#5029)

This release includes the following **fixes**:
1. Fix leak in `SecurityManager::participant_volatile_message_secure_writer_` (#4726)
2. Fix Discovery Server over TCP (#4656)
3. Fix some leaks in XML DynamicTypes Parser (#4763)
4. Correct liveliness state in a multiple reader - one writer scenario (#4884)
5. Fix support for `@key` annotation in Dynamic types (#4749)
6. Properly delete builtin statistics writers upon `delete_contained_entities()` (#4917)
7. Correctly initialize `MatchingFailureMask` constants to be used with the `std::bitset` API (#4928)
8. Set DataSharing in Writer|ReaderProxyData (#4804)
9. Only apply content filter to ALIVE changes (#4904)
10. Handle errors when setting socket buffer sizes (#4825)
12. Automatically unmatch remote participants on participant deletion (#4865)
14. Fix on_sample_lost notification on best-effort readers for fragmented samples (#4607)
15. Handle errors when setting socket buffer sizes (#4852)
16. Fix DS servers not connecting due to ports logic (#4952)
17. Manual fix for documentation generation (#5013)
18. Create InitialConnection for TCP initial peers (#5003)

PRs in merged order:
#4733, #4726, #4656, #4784, #4774, #4763, #4766, #4513, #4847, #4841, #4821, #4533, #4870, #4831, #4868, #4811, #4884, #4749, #4917, #4928, #4804, #4957, #4976, #4983, #4904, #4907, #4899, #4825, #4865, #4607, #4852, #4952, #5013, #5003, #5029, #5027

name: v2.14.2
body:
# Fast DDS v2.14.2

This release includes the following **features** in an ABI compatible manner:

1. Set DataSharing Qos policy in transmitted `Writer`|`ReaderProxyData` (#4801)
1. New `max_message_size` property to limit the output datagrams size (#4805)
1. Add XML configuration for `FlowControllerDescriptor` (#4893, #4911)

This release includes the following **improvements**:

1. Repository & CI improvements (#4781, #4790, #4800, #4799, #4808, #4934, #4954, #4973, #4844, #4838, #4854)
1. Do not require PYTHON_VERSION to be defined in .bat files (#4797)
1. Use `%*` instead of loop in `.bat` scripts. (#4818)
1. Use absolute paths when loading XML files (#4828)
1. Bump Fast CDR submodule to version 2.2.2 (#4977)

This release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Handle errors when setting socket buffer sizes (#4796)
1. Do not require Fast CDR v2 in examples (#4833)
1. Fix ShmTransport buffer recovery MacOS flaky test (#4855)
1. Automatically unmatch remote participants on participant deletion (#4849)
1. Bugfix: correct liveliness state in a multiple reader - one writer scenario (#4881)
1. Only apply content filter to ALIVE changes (#4876)
1. Properly delete builtin statistics writers upon `delete_contained_entities()` (#4914)
1. Fix doxygen warning about undocumented param in deleted functions (#4918)
1. Correctly initialize `MatchingFailureMask` constants to be used with the `std::bitset` API (#4925)
1. Fix DS servers not connecting due to ports logic (#4949)

PRs in merged order:
#4781, #4790, #4800, #4799, #4796, #4797, #4801, #4805, #4808, #4818, #4833, #4844, #4838, #4828, #4855, #4849, #4854, #4881, #4876, #4893, #4911, #4914, #4918, #4925, #4934, #4949, #4954, #4973, #4977

name: v2.10.4
body:
# Fast DDS v2.10.4

This release includes the following **features** in an ABI compatible manner:
1. TCP Client&Server Participant Decision-Making (#4385)
2. Expose Authentication Handshake Properties (#4487)
3. New `max_message_size` property to limit output datagrams size (#4807)

This release includes the following **improvements**:
1. Return const reference in get_log_resources (#4303)
2. Include variety of terminate process signals handler in discovery server (#4333)
3. Check History QoS inconsistencies (#4407, #4423, #4440)
4. Make DataWriters always send the key hash on keyed topics (#4352)
5. LARGE_DATA Participants logic with same listening ports (#4433)
6. Effectively assert automatic/manual_by_participant liveliness (#4595)
7. Improve checklist on PR template (#4660, #4783)
8. Allow processing of AckNack submessages with count == 0 (#4773)
9. Internal refactor on port handling (#4698)
10. Upgrade Fast CDR submodule to v1.0.28 (#4826)

TCP transport improvements:
1. TCP non-blocking send (#4329)
2. Enabling multiple interfaces through whitelist in TCP servers (#4413)
3. Set real TCP non_blocking_send limitation (#4630)
4. Clean up TCP send resources on peer disconnection (#4512)

Github CI management:
1. Add macOS Github CI (#4400)
2. Avoid running GitHub CI if PR has conflicts (#4492)

name: v2.13.0
body:
# Fast DDS v2.13.0

This minor release includes several new features, improvements and bugfixes.

**IMPORTANT** This release upgrades the following Fast DDS dependencies:

* [Fast CDR v2.1.2](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-CDR/releases/tag/v2.1.2)
* [Fast DDS Gen v3.2.0](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS-Gen/releases/tag/v3.2.0)


## New features

 1. Support Monitor Service (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/3894)
 2. Enable configuration of thread settings for all threads (both through the C++ API and XML configuration files) (#4013)
 3. Support `Autofill port` (automatic assignment of a port) for TCP Transport (#4061)
 3. Support TCP for Discovery server CLI and environment variable (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4097)
 4. Usage of gtest_discover_tests (#3971)
 5. Define a super client by environment variable (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4047)
 6. Support adding interfaces to the interface whitelist by the name (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/3973)
 7. Add new methods to configure transport scenarios (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4098, #4176)
 8. Support `DataRepresentationQos` (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/3972)
 9. Change serialize function default behavior to omit the data representation (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4131)
 10. Upgrade Fast CDR submodule to v2.1.2 (#4175)
 11. Update roadmap & platforms support (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4159)

## Improvements

 1. Rerun failed tests with ctest option instead of colcon's (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4081)
 2. Add CCache to all CI jobs (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4114)
 4. Better handling of trigger events in docs CI (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4095)

## Fixes

 1. Fix compilation of `XMLProfileParserTests` when building without security (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4040)
 5. Improve `IgnoreNonExistentSegment` test for Windows (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4036)

 23. Fix colcon on github CI (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4075)
 24. Fix gtest discovery timeout (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4048)
 25. Mark `on_participant_discovery` overload removal (https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/pull/4078)

name: v2.12.0
body:
# Fast DDS v2.12.0

This minor release includes several new features, improvements and bugfixes.

**IMPORTANT** This release upgrades the following Fast DDS dependencies:

* [Fast CDR v2.0.0](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-CDR/releases/tag/v2.0.0)
* [Fast DDS-Gen v3.0.1](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS-Gen/releases/tag/v3.0.1).

**Please, read also the release notes of [Fast DDS-Gen v3.0.0](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS-Gen/releases/tag/v3.0.0) to be aware of every possible break in the application code.**

Mind that, there is a minor API break with previous v2.x versions: `MEMBER_INVALID` identifier was declared using `#define`. In order to prevent polluting the user workspace, it has been transformed into a `constexpr` within `eprosima::fastrtps::types` namespace.
Also, as Fast DDS dependencies have been upgraded to new major releases, depending on the types defined in the IDL files, it might be required to modify the user application source code besides recompiling it (more information can be found in the corresponding release notes). Finally, the type support **must** be regenerated from the IDL files using Fast DDS-Gen v3.0.0.

## New features

1. New participant property to configure SHM transport metatraffic behavior (#3753)
1. Exposed custom payload pool on DDS endpoints declaration (#3755)
    * Feature example (#3598)
1. Processing environment variables in XML text (#3841)
1. Dependencies
    1. Upgrade internal type supports using latest Fast DDS-Gen release v3.0.0 (#3828, #3893)
    1. Upgrade Fast CDR submodule to v2.0.0 introducing XCDR encoding version 2 (#3828)

## Improvements

1. Fast DDS improvements
    1. `fixed_string` comparison operators (#3623)
    1. Remove mutex from `TimedEventImpl` (#3745, #3760)
    1. Performance improvements on intraprocess and datasharing (#3743)
    1. Improve Shared Memory resilience to crashing participants (#3759)
    1. Improve scripts shebang portability (#3732)
    1. Use `foonathan_memory` to reduce allocations in SharedMemManager (#3833)

## Fixes

1. Fast DDS bugfixes
    1. Fixed XMLParser null-dereference when parsing log configuration (#3769)
    1. Allow participant XML profiles with no `<rtps>` tag (#3771)
    1. Fix encapsulation format in Writer Liveliness Protocol (#3784)
    1. Fix `DomainParticipant::register_remote_type` return when negotiating type (#3786)
    1. Fix strict real-time feature when using Flow Controller feature (#3735)
    1. Fix ParameterPropertyList increment operators (#3739)
    1. Fix bad-free when receiving malformed DATA submessage (#3824)
    1. Fix asymmetric whitelist matching (#3733)
    1. Fix heap-use-after-free on XMLElementParser (#3866)
    1. Fix History remove change return statement (#3858)
1. CI fixes
    1. Fix RemoteBuiltinEndpointHonoring blackbox test (#3787)
    1. Improve repository workflows (#3831, #3837, #3838, #3503)
    1. Use `FASTRTPS_NO_LIB` on unittest root folder (#3856)
    1. Fix Windows workflow (#3876, #3887)
1. Tools
    1. Remove C++11 check in fast-discovery-server CLI tool (#3891)
1. Examples
    1. Fix HelloWorldDataSharing data type (#3714)
1. Documentation
    1. Doxygen typos (#3744)
1. Repository
    1. Remove 2.9.x as active branch (#3720)
1. Non Tier 1 support
    1. Fixed SHM in 32-bit architectures (#3752)
    1. Fix warning on Win32 architecture (#3741)

PRs in merged order:
#3720, #3623, #3744, #3745, #3743, #3760, #3759, #3752, #3769, #3753, #3771, #3755, #3784, #3787, #3786, #3831, #3837, #3838, #3735, #3741, #3503, #3739, #3732, #3841, #3824, #3856, #3733, #3866, #3858, #3828, #3876, #3598, #3714, #3833, #3891, #3887, #3893, #3881

name: v2.11.0
body:
# Fast DDS v2.11.0

This minor release includes several improvements and bugfixes.

Mind that, even though this release is API compatible with previous v2.x versions, it is *NOT* ABI compatible with previous versions.
This means that applications upgrading Fast DDS to v2.11.0 will require recompilation, though not source code modification.

It is also advisable to regenerate the type support from the IDL files using [Fast DDS-Gen v2.5.1](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS-Gen/releases/tag/v2.5.1).
Furthermore, if upgrading to v2.11.0, it is also recommended to upgrade Fast CDR to [v1.1.0](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-CDR/releases/tag/v1.1.0).

## New features

1. Ignore every local endpoint within the DomainParticipant preventing local matching (#3480)
1. Extend DynamicDataHelper API providing a `print` overload with `std::ostream` as parameter (#3484)
1. TypeLookup Service configuration through XML (#3547)
1. Static Discovery XSD Schema (#3404)

## Improvements
1. Fast DDS improvements
    1. Assign minimum available participant ID to new participants (#3437)
    1. Export symbols correctly on ContentFilteredTopic (#2611)
    1. Improve content filter expression parameters check and verbosity (#3565)
    1. Check TCP headers endianness (#2776)
    1. Security module: distinguished names (DN) comparison (#3559)
1. Fast DDS deprecation
    1. DDS:Crypto:AES-GCM-GMAC configuration using Property Policy QoS (security vulnerability) (#2577)
1. CI improvements
    1. Include BitmapRange unit tests (#2737)
    1. Support for running some tests in parallel (#2886, #3624)
    1. Windows workflow (#3367, #3616)
1. Build system
    1. Improve CMake target loading. Removal of `FASTDDS_STATIC` CMake option (#3134, #3653)
    1. Avoid auto-linkage using CMake (#3133)
1. Dependencies
    1. Upgrade internal type supports using latest Fast DDS-Gen release v2.5.1 (#3581, #3615)
    1. Upgrade Fast CDR submodule to v1.1.0 (#3582)
1. Examples
    1. Admit XML configuration files in AdvanceConfigurationExample (#3554, #3617)
    1. New Discovery Server example (#2924)

## Fixes
1. Fast DDS bugfixes
    1. Fix crash when creating two participants with the same fixed participant ID (#3443)
    1. Fix crash when calling `on_requested_deadline_missed` callback (#3423)
    1. Fix crashes caused by not capturing every Fast CDR exception (#3528)
    1. Correctly resolve aliases in DDSSQLFilter (#3530)
    1. Wait for log background thread initialization on the first queued entry (#3270)
    1. Fix data race when accessing `WRITE_PARAM_DEFAULT` static variable (#3282)
    1. Fix partition copy in QoS (#1947)
    1. Fix Data-Sharing delivery when data_count is zero (#3065)
    1. Fix API Fast DDS v2.10.0 API break calling correctly `on_participant_discovery` callbacks (#3479)
    1. Security module: Honor `allow_unauthenticated_participants` flag (#3385)
    1. Fix concurrent access to `DomainParticipantFactory::load_profiles` (#3281)
    1. Fix UBSan (Undefined Behavior Sanitizer) issues (#3441)
    1. Improve Doxygen documentation about DomainParticipantListener discovery callbacks (#3619)
1. XSD fixes
    1. Set TransportDescriptor kind parameter as optional (#3470)
    1. Correctly assign QoS to the proper endpoint (#3492)
    1. Add missing tags (#3399, #3534)
1. CI fixes
    1. Fix null dereference in fuzzer code (#3436)
    1. Limit Thread Sanitizer memory usage to prevent runner shutdown (#3442)
    1. Use correct time unit in latency tests (#3516)
    1. Run communication tests (#3614)
1. Examples
    1. Correct DDS entity deletion order (#3558)
1. Installer generation
    1. Add documentation fallback when the documentation tag is not found (#3551)
1. Repository
    1. Remove 2.1.x as active branch (#3525)
    1. Remove 2.8.x as active branch (#3455)
1. Non Tier 1 support
    1. Fix build on MSVC 19.36 (#3462)
    1. Forward compatibility with Boost interprocess 1.74+ (#3488)
    1. Include missing header files required for compiling with GCC 13 (#3508)
    1. QNX build fixes (#3531)
    1. Fix build issues in RPM systems (#1881)

PRs in merged order:
#3436, #3437, #3442, #3443, #3423, #3462, #3470, #3134, #3455, #3480, #3492, #3488, #3508, #3500, #3385, #3399, #3525, #3534, #3484, #3528, #3547, #3531, #3558, #3551, #3516, #3581, #3530, #1881, #2611, #3554, #3565, #2924, #3270, #2577, #2776, #3282, #1947, #2737, #3065, #2886, #3133, #3479, #3367, #3559, #3404, #3281, #3582, #3441, #3615, #3617, #3614, #3619, #3633, #3624, #3616, #3648, #3653
